title: Standing Figure with Jeweled Headdress
medium: Gypsum plaster; modeled, carved, polychrome-painted, gilded
dimensions:
H. 56 1/2 in. (143.5 cm)
W. 20 1/4 in. (51.5 cm) 
Gr. D. 10 in. (25.4 cm)
Wt. including crate: 437 lbs. (198.2 kg)  
from the bottom of the coat to the top of the crown 45.3 inches (115 cm)
creditLine: Metropolitan Museum of Art. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Lester Wolfe, 1967
